name: Young Topaz Dragon
senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 17

traits.name: Uplift Aura
traits.desc: All allies within 30 feet gain +2 on Intelligence checks and saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.
